data.title: Real Madrid's Kylian Mbappe becomes youngest club owner in European football history, know the inside story
data.meta_description: Kylian Mbappe has etched his name yet again in the European football's history books by becoming the youngest stakeholder of a European club ever, at the age of just 25. He will be moving ahead with his acquisition of this premier tier football club through his investment fund Coalition Capital, according to latest reports.
data.text:
Synopsis

Kylian Mbappe has etched his name yet again in the European football's history books by becoming the youngest stakeholder of a European club ever, at the age of just 25. He will be moving ahead with his acquisition of this premier tier football club through his investment fund Coalition Capital, according to latest reports.

Kylian Mbappe has already become the talk of European football after his entry into Real Madrid in a grand unveiling in the presence of 85,000 people at Santiago Bernabeu. His Cristiano Ronaldo style jersey respect became the sensation on social media after the unveiling ceremony, which saw Zinedine Zidane and Real Madrid CF President cheering him onstage.

Mbappe acquires 80% stake in French Ligue 2 club

However, this is not the only thing that has been eye-catching for the France football star. According to a Bolavip US report, he has now become the youngest ever individual at the age of just 25, to become a club owner in European football. The club in context here is Caen’s Stade Malherbe, which is Ligue 2 club, playing primarily in France, along with other major championships. Mbappe's purchase of this club is valued at around €20 million, with the investment happening through his investment fund Coalition Capital. This investment will make him an 80% owner of this Ligue 2 club and give him the majority stakes and ownerships, says latest reports.

Also Read : Is Donald Trump's insults to Kamala Harris falling flat?

Mbappe completes full circle with club ownership

Moreover, Mbappe also has a rich history with this club he acquired, as he was on the verge of signing up as a player in Stade Malherbe de Caen, at the age of 13, before choosing AS Monaco, a rival club. Now at the age of just 25, he has completed a full circle with his journey at this club.

Kylian Mbappe's updates around Real Madrid journey

Kylian Mbappe will be starting off his Real Madrid journey soon, with an expected first match at the European Super Cup on August 14 in Warsaw. He did not travel for the recent US Tour with the team, which came in as a sad news for Madrid fans.

Also Read : Here’s what Marvel is paying Robert Downey Jr to play Dr Doom

FAQs:

Is Kylian Mbappe a football club owner?

Kylian Mbappe, through his investment fund, has become a 80% owner in a French Ligue 2 club recently, being the youngest individual to own a football team.

What is Kylian Mbappe's age?

Kylian Mbappe's current age is 25, and has etched more than a few records as a young European football player, currently with Real Madrid CF.
